name: Lucian Merciless
rules_text:
When you play me, you may equip one of your Equipment to me for 1 less, even if it's already attached.
The first time I conquer each turn, ready me.

params.summary: When played, can equip Equipment for 1 less. Readies when conquering for the first time each turn.

flavor: “One of us finds peace. One of us walks away.”
